name: Slack OOO Personal
description: Your personal Slack Out of Office bot

APP_REMINDER.description: Time to wait before responding to person/channel again (in minutes)

APP_RESPOND_DM.description: If true, will response to Direct Message

APP_RESPOND_CHANNEL.description: If true, will response to Channel messages

APP_RESPOND_KEYWORDS.description: Comma separated list of other keywords to respond to

APP_RESPOND_DMPREFIX.value: Hello ${user}. I'm currently out of the office with message:

APP_RESPOND_CHANNELPREFIX.value: Hello ${channel}. I'm currently out of the office with message:

APP_TIMEBOX_START.description: Time to start responding (Timestamp in milliseconds, or parsable date)

APP_TIMEBOX_END.description: Time to stop responding (Timestamp in milliseconds, or parsable date)

APP_ANNOUNCE_TIMES.description: A list of times to announce OoO users

APP_ANNOUNCE_CHANNELS.description: A list of channels to announce OoO users on
